content: * *This article has multiple issues.** Please help **improve it** or discuss these issues on the **talk page**. *(Learn how and when to remove these messages)*This article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "List of Singapore Armed Forces bases" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(May 2018)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)*This article needs to be **updated**. Please help update this article to reflect recent events or newly available information. *(May 2018)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* The following is a list of the camps and bases of the [Singapore Armed Forces](/wiki/Singapore_Armed_Forces). ## Singapore Army camps NameLocationUnit(s)Amoy Quee Camp[Ang Mo Kio](/wiki/Ang_Mo_Kio) - [HQ National Cadet Corps](/wiki/National_Cadet_Corps_(Singapore)) (HQ NCC) - [HQ 3rd Division Artillery](/wiki/Singapore_Artillery) (HQ 3 DIV ARTY) [*citation needed*] Bedok Camp[Tanah Merah](/wiki/Tanah_Merah,_Singapore) - [HQ 7th Singapore Infantry Brigade](/wiki/Guards_(Singapore_Army)) (HQ 7 SIB) - [3rd Battalion, Singapore Guards](/wiki/Guards_(Singapore_Army)) (3 GDS) - Bedok Fitness and Conditioning Centre (Bedok FCC) Clementi Camp[Clementi](/wiki/Clementi,_Singapore) - [HQ 2nd People's Defence Force](/wiki/2nd_People%27s_Defence_Force) (HQ 2 PDF) - [Island Defence Training Institute](/wiki/2nd_People%27s_Defence_Force) (IDTI) - [15th Command, Control, Communications, Computers and Intelligence Battalion](/wiki/Signals_(Singapore_Army)) (15 C4I) - [8th Battalion, Singapore Infantry Regiment](/wiki/Infantry_(Singapore_Army)) (8 SIR)[*citation needed*] Depot Road Camp[Bukit Merah](/wiki/Bukit_Merah) - Central Manpower Base (CMPB) - [Defence Science and Technology Agency](/wiki/Defence_Science_and_Technology_Agency) (DSTA) [Dieppe Barracks](/wiki/Dieppe_Barracks)[Yishun](/wiki/Yishun) - [1st Commando Battalion](/wiki/Commandos_(Singapore_Army)) (1 CDO) Jurong Camp I[Jurong West](/wiki/Jurong_West) - [HQ 3rd Division](/wiki/3rd_Singapore_Division) (HQ 3 DIV) - [17th Command, Control, Communications, Computers and Intelligence Battalion](/wiki/Signals_(Singapore_Army)) (17 C4I) - [3rd Army Maintenance Base](/wiki/Maintenance_and_Engineering_Support_(Singapore_Army)) (3 AMB) Jurong Camp II - [Infantry Training Institute](/wiki/Infantry_(Singapore_Army)) (ITI) - [30th Battalion, Singapore Combat Engineers](/wiki/Singapore_Combat_Engineers) (30 SCE) Kaki Bukit Camp[Kaki Bukit](/wiki/Kaki_Bukit,_Singapore) - title: List of Singapore Armed Forces bases
